name: Jeeves Quest
description:
A HOUSE CAT'S MISSION

To find his missing human, Jeeves must journey across a surreal basement world and confront a smoke-breathing nemesis to reach the forbidden surface.

Embark on a cat's tale in this short and sweet retro platformer featuring colorful original pixel art, pulsing synthwave soundtrack, challenging old school gameplay, and a heartwarming personal story about a cat's love for a girl.

CONTENT
  • Play as Jeeves, a lovable Cornish Rex house cat!
  • Scurry and leap through 4 surreal basement worlds littered with enemies, collectibles, and... litter!
  • Jump on spiders, frogs, and other nasties to defeat them!
  • Challenge a fearsome boss in his extremely dank lair!
  • Eat pink hair ties for points and 1-ups!
  • Smash and break human stuff for no reason! It's what Jeeves would want.
  • Meow a lot with the highly useful dedicated meow button!
  • Keyboard and Gamepad support!
  • Playtime: ~15-30 minutes (how fast can you speedrun?)

CONTROLS InputKeyboardGamepadMovementArrow Keys / WSAD
D-PadJumpSpace Bar"A"/Lower Face ButtonMeowEnter / E
"B"/Right Face Button
Pause/MenuEsc
Start Button TIPS
  • Jeeves can jump higher the longer you hold the jump button
  • Jeeves can also jump higher with a short running start
  • Jeeves starts with 9 lives and gets a 1-up (extra life) for every 100 hair ties he eats
  • Stomping enemies in a chain without touching the ground increases points
  • Don't forget to meow! It must be useful for something...

DEV NOTES/ROADMAP

I made this game in ~1 month as a birthday present, using Blueprint and Paper2D tools in UE5. Another ~1 month went into polishing and "juicing" for this public Itch release. About 99% of the visuals are original.

This is a complete game and there are no current plans to add new content, though that could change if there is interest in more. 

VERSION HISTORY
  • 10/14/22 : v. 1.0 : Initial Itch public release; added particle effects, controller rumble, and other juice; tweaked level design; QA and polish
  • 9/11/22 : v.0.93 : Original (private) birthday gift version
  • 8/13/22 : Began development

Parental Advisory: Depictions of drug use/smoking; cartoon violence/comic mischief; excessive meowing
